name: Moonfall Shrine
content:
Moonfall Shrine

An old site of devotion to the shattered moon, scattered with prayer-flags and charred votive pits. Objectives are memory-altars. Every faction claims it once belonged to them.


Terrain Features:

  • Charred votive pits
  • Prayer flags
  • Memory altars
  • Ancient ruins

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with the scent of old incense and ash. The ground is littered with fragments of moonstone and broken prayer beads. The wind carries whispers of forgotten prayers.
